mapper.select: SELECT k.id, k.spu_id AS spuId, k.bar_code AS barCode, p.category_id AS categoryId, k.title, p.title AS spuTitle, k.img, k.original_price AS originalPrice, k.price, k.vip_price AS vipPrice, k.stock, k.freeze_stock AS freezeStock, k.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, k.gmtCreate AS gmtCreate FROM unimall_sku AS k, unimall_spu AS p WHERE k.id = #{skuId} k.spu_id = p.id
